name: MusicLabeLManagerExtra 2K21
description:
MusicLabelManager is a music industry simulator that allows players to create and run their own record label. Players take the role of CEO and try to make their mark on the music industry. The game has a database with more than 1000 real artists with stats for 2021. Music awards, singles, concert tours, streaming services and much more!

Achievements!
Collect achievements to receive bonuses in the game and increase your score!
Every decade is new achievements to collect!

Streaming services
Publish music to the most popular streaming services, and earn!

Stats
Collect points in 6 different categories

Music videos
Promote the album by publishing music videos!

World
Bands in the world release albums and change throughout the game!

Social Media
Improve your social media marketing!

Music Videos
Promote selected music videos and increase views!
